mapper.select: SELECT a.id ,a.navigateCode as code,nb.name as parentName,a.name,a.level, a.type,a.parentId as parentId,a.url,c.id AS cityOpenInfoId FROM sys_navigationbar AS a INNER JOIN sys_cityopen_function AS b ON a.id = b.navigationBarId INNER JOIN sys_cityopeninfo AS c ON b.cityOpenInfoId = c.id left JOIN sys_navigationbar nb on nb.id = a.parentId where c.cityCode =#{cityCode} and a.type =#{type}
select c.cityCode,c.cityName,c.provinceCode,c.provinceName,c.url,a.latitude,a.longitude,a.pinyin,isHot from sys_cityopeninfo AS c INNER JOIN sys_area AS a ON c.isValid=1 AND c.cityCode=a.code
